tasks.label: Startup: 0 - Branch Gate
tasks.command: BRANCH=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ "$BRANCH" != "soheil-design" ]; then echo "Not on soheil-design branch (current: $BRANCH) - all startup tasks disabled"; exit 1; fi && echo 'On soheil-design branch - proceeding with startup'

tasks.label: Startup: 1 - Sync Preview Branch
tasks.command: echo 'Step 1/5: Checking preview branch...' && git fetch origin preview 2>/dev/null && PREVIEW_COMMITS=$(git log soheil-design..origin/preview --oneline 2>/dev/null | head -20) && if [ -z "$PREVIEW_COMMITS" ]; then echo 'soheil-design is up to date with preview'; else echo 'Preview has new commits:' && echo "$PREVIEW_COMMITS" && git merge origin/preview --no-edit 2>&1; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then echo 'WARNING: MERGE CONFLICT! Resolve manually.' && exit 1; fi && echo 'Merged preview into soheil-design'; fi

tasks.label: Startup: 2 - Clean and Kill Processes
tasks.command: echo 'Step 2/5: Killing processes and cleaning cache...' && lsof -ti:5173 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && lsof -ti:8787 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm clean && rm -rf .turbo && echo 'Cache cleaned and processes killed'

tasks.label: Startup: 3 - Install and Migrate DB
tasks.command: echo 'Step 3/5: Installing dependencies and applying migrations...' && pnpm i && pnpm db:migrate:local && echo 'Dependencies installed and migrations applied'

tasks.label: Startup: 4 - Dev Server
tasks.command: echo 'Step 4/5: Starting dev server...' && pnpm dev

tasks.label: Startup: 5 - Claude Agent
tasks.command: echo 'Step 5/5: Starting Claude agent...' && sleep 5 && claude --dangerously-skip-permissions
